title: Whenever I restart my pixel 4 xl, it deletes all of my widgets and web shortcuts. Help please?!
content: It doens happen every time but often when I accept a software update or if I restart bc my phone is slow or not responding or my Google keyboard wont come up... Whenever it restarts, all of my 30+ widgets and web shortcuts and Google doc shortcuts are gone from my home screen. Customer service can I solve the problem. I have submitted multiple feedback request but the problem still happens.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 4 XL
